name: Autumn World
description:
Summary: It's autumn! You're just on a walk in the park when you see a brown and white rabbit. What do you do? Follow it? Don't follow it? The choice is yours in this Choose-Your-Own-Adventure/Interactive Fiction game! Comes with two endings, and a variety of choices!

How To Play: Click with your mouse on the choices that are bolded. What you choose may lead to one end, or the other. 

Credits: This entire game was created by ClariLaGames on Twine, and the cover image was also made by ClariLaGames on Canva. 

Other notes: Submission for the "Great Harvest" Game Jam (August 24th to September 21st, 2020). 

I would love to eventually create an expanded version of this game, either as a full text adventure with more paths and/or endings, or as a Visual Novel. Feedback is welcome! 

Due to the colour palette rules of this game jam, the colour used in the background of the game is #e36956.

The image used for the game is made on Canva, and I used the colours #ff6b97, #f2a65e, #964253, and #473b78.

This game contains quite a few punny names relating to the Autumn theme. You've been warned!
